ch0123_40_mizuki/0101_0701_01_10:
Alola, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s hit the
ground running today, just like we always do!
ch0123_40_mizuki/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s do our best to keep smiles on everyone’s
faces!
ch0123_40_mizuki/7101_0701_01_10:
It’s a hero’s job to get the show’s audience all
fired up!
ch0123_40_mizuki/7101_0701_02_10:
I’m not sure I can do as good a job of it as the
Masked Royal...
ch0123_40_mizuki/7101_0701_03_10:
but I’ll be performing as hard as I can, so
hopefully the guests’ll have fun!
ch0123_40_mizuki/7102_0701_01_10:
Scizor’s steel pincers can crush anything into bits,
no matter how hard it is!
ch0123_40_mizuki/7102_0701_02_10:
That’s why I’m sure we as a sync pair can crush
any bad guys we take on!
ch0123_40_mizuki/7103_0701_01_10:
Hey, guess what?! I thought of something that could
really entertain the crowd at the show! Wanna
hear?!
ch0123_40_mizuki/7103_0701_02_10:
We could have the heroes make a dramatic
entrance by arriving on Ride Pokémon!
ch0123_40_mizuki/7103_0701_03_10:
And not just on land—from the sea or the sky
too!
ch0123_40_mizuki/7103_0701_04_10: What do you think? Isn’t that a great idea?
ch0123_40_mizuki/7104_0701_01_10: Every hero’s gotta have a catchphrase!
ch0123_40_mizuki/7104_0701_02_10:
For me, I guess it could be “Alola!”
...Maybe?
ch0123_40_mizuki/7104_0701_03_10:
That’s just my usual greeting, though, so it doesn’t
really have the impact I’m looking for. Can you
think of any other good lines?
ch0123_40_mizuki/7105_0701_01_10:
You help the people around you all the time too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0123_40_mizuki/7105_0701_02_10: If you ask me, that definitely makes you a hero!
ch0123_40_mizuki/7105_0701_03_10:
Let’s keep working hard to be good role models
for others!
ch0123_40_mizuki/1701_0701_01_10:
Here, I’ve got something for you that could be
useful!
ch0123_40_mizuki/1701_0702_01_10: Maybe it’ll even help you get out of a tight spot!
ch0123_40_mizuki/2501_0701_01_10:
Rosa told me Pokéstar Studios has lots of different
genres of films!
ch0123_40_mizuki/2501_0701_02_10:
And it sounds like they’ve made a lot of movies
that feature battling heroes, too—like “Invaders”
and “Big Monster.”
ch0123_40_mizuki/2501_0701_03_10:
Y’know, I bet I could do some pretty good acting
now!
ch0123_40_mizuki/2501_0702_01_10:
Even things that aren’t real can show up in
movies! Technology is amazing!
ch0123_40_mizuki/2501_0702_02_10:
Although...are we sure monsters and stuff like
that don’t really exist?
ch0123_40_mizuki/2511_0701_01_10:
It’s so exciting and fun to act while fully immersing
yourself in your character!
ch0123_40_mizuki/2511_0701_02_10:
...When I said that to Professor Kukui, he said he
totally got it!
ch0123_40_mizuki/2511_0701_03_10: I wonder if he’s done some acting before, too.
ch0123_40_mizuki/2511_0702_01_10:
I want to learn and experience so many more
things, so I can see lots of different sides of
myself!
ch0123_40_mizuki/2511_0702_02_10:
Then I’ll be able to say “Alola!” to a new me I’ve
never met before!
ch0123_40_mizuki/3001_0701_01_10:
It’s a perfect day for adventure! I sure hope we
get to meet all sorts of interesting sync pairs!
ch0123_40_mizuki/3003_0701_01_10:
Alola! That’s how we say “hi” in the Alola region!
Now you try it! Go on!
ch0123_40_mizuki/3005_0701_01_10:
I saw a shooting star a little while ago! Don’t
worry—I made sure to wish for everybody to
always be happy!
